text: Emanuel Ungaro (13 February 1933 â€“ 22 December 2019) was a French fashion designer. Ungaro launched his first menswear collection, Ungaro Uomo, in 1973, and his first perfume, Diva, 10 years later in 1983. Ungaro was a participant in The Battle of Versailles Fashion Show held on November 28, 1973. Later followed the perfumes Senso (1987), Ungaro (1991) and Emanuel Ungaro For Men (1991). Ungaro died in Paris on 22 December 2019 at the age of 86.Emanuel Ungaro: French fashion designer Emanuel dies aged 86 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French fashion designers Category:People from Aix-en-Provence
title: Emanuel Ungaro
